Sentencas: A detailed procedure for the preparation of gadolinium doped (10 mol%) cerium (IV) oxide (CGO) suspension for inkjet printing is described in this paper.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The optimisation of inkjet printing parameters for the deposition of solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes was also performed using a custom-built drop visualisation system.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Additionally, the uniformity of the deposited drop relics on porous substrates was evaluated.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The ink used in this study was an evaporative type comprising a solvent mixture of terpineol and methanol, ethyl cellulose and CGO powder.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Successful printing of regular drops was achieved after printing optimisation.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: It has been demonstrated that inkjet printing is a promising technique for high quality membrane fabrication for applications including solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Optimisation of CGO suspensions for inkjet-printed SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: The ink formulation and optimisation procedure would also be applicable for other ceramic ink development.
